faq.question: How much space is required for ground-mount solar in Enfield?
faq.answer: For a typical residential ground-mount solar system in Enfield (6-10 kW), you'll need approximately 600-2,000 square feet of land. faq.question: Is ground-mount solar cost-effective compared to rooftop installation?
faq.answer: While ground-mount systems have slightly higher upfront costs (typically 10-20% more), they often generate 15-25% more electricity due to optimal positioning. Combined with the competitive pricing and easier maintenance, many Enfield homeowners find ground-mount solar offers better long-term value, especially for properties with roof shading or structural concerns.
